description:
Alibaba has announced Marco-o1, a large language model (LLM) designed to tackle both conventional and open-ended problem-solving tasks. Marco-o1, from Alibaba’s MarcoPolo team, represents another step forward in the ability of AI to handle complex reasoning challenges—particularly in maths, physics, coding, and areas where clear standards may be absent. Building upon OpenAI’s reasoning advancements with... Read more »

The post Alibaba Marco-o1: Advancing LLM reasoning capabilities appeared first on AI News.
title: Alibaba Marco-o1: Advancing LLM reasoning capabilities

description:
OpenAI and other leading AI companies are developing new training techniques to overcome limitations of current methods. Addressing unexpected delays and complications in the development of larger, more powerful language models, these fresh techniques focus on human-like behaviour to teach algorithms to ‘think. Reportedly led by a dozen AI researchers, scientists, and investors, the new... Read more »

The post New AI training techniques aim to overcome current challenges appeared first on AI News.
title: New AI training techniques aim to overcome current challenges
